## To lower case

```{r}
strings <- c("Header 1", "Header 2")
(strings <- tolower(strings))
```

## Replace space with other symbols

```{r}
(strings <- gsub(" ", ".", strings))
```

## Remove punctuations from strings
```{r}
(strings <- c("header_1+", "header_2*"))
library(tm)
removePunctuation(strings)

# remove only the ending punctuations
gsub("(^.*)([[:punct:]]$)", "\\1", strings) 
```
